name: MonsterTrap
description:
The goal of the game
Collect as many points as possible by destroying the monsters of different health that appear on the board.

Gameplay
There are different tools to be placed on the table. The aim is to hit the monsters by two starts of fire.
To be efficient you can create a chain of tools to initiate each other one by one. 

Control
Move tools: mouse + left click
Turn tools: mouse right click (while you are still holding left pressed). (not the best yet, for sure). :)
